::Battera::

She noticed how suddenly Rex cared wheather or not she got slagged. 
This was a good thing.   She smiled a little.
"I had a question and knew I could find you here.  I was wondering, 
would it be OK if I stepped outside for a bit? I would like to get 
some fresh air. Would you like to join...er...escort me?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex turns his head as he hears someone walk up, nearly jumping up 
as he sees 
> Battera at the doorway.
> 
> "Are you crazy?" he asks her, standing up and walking toward 
her, "Nearly 
> getting slagged by me wasn't enough? If Firearm sees you, you'll be 
dead 
> before you can blink!"
